FuncDef:
The binding interface command binds an iFIT flow to a specified interface.
The undo binding interface command unbinds an iFIT flow from an interface.
By default, an iFIT flow is not bound to any interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To bind an iFIT flow to a specified interface, run the binding interface command.For details about supported interface types, see "iFIT Configuration Precautions" in iFIT Configuration.
